mandela.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

dewey.text: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.

malcolm.text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

bloom.text: Education is the movement from darkness to light.

ebbinghaus.text: Education is the act of learning things that are not previously known.

quotes.mandela: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.sassoon: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.einstein_idea: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
quotes.davis: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.einstein_knowledge: The only source of knowledge is experience.

home.welcome_message: Welcome to BRIGMIND! We are an educational platform that brings technological knowledge to everyone, regardless of location or resources. We offer accessible courses in programming, artificial intelligence, and more, from any device, with in-person workshops and mentoring programs. Join our community and transform your future with the power of education.
home.mission_message: Our mission is to democratize technological education, providing inclusive and practical access to children, youth, and adults in rural and low-resource areas. At DidÃ¡ctica, we empower individuals with digital skills for their personal and professional development.
home.quality_message: High-quality courses created by experts, with practical and relevant content.
home.online_message: Learn from anywhere and any device, with offline study options.
home.certificate_message: Receive a certificate upon completing each course to showcase your skills.
home.diversity_message: We offer courses in areas such as programming and artificial intelligence for all levels.
home.partners_message: This company is characterized by its effort and dedication, contributing a lot to society.
